MS MCQs

    Enable secure external collaboration for your applications with Azure AD B2B - Enable multi-factor authentication in Azure AD B2B

    »

    1. At what levels can multi-factor authentication be enforced?

      Application level, user level, and category level.

      Tenant level, user level, and application level.

      User level, application level, and strength level.


    2. Which of the following are valid categories for multi-factor authentication?

      Something a user possesses, and something the user does not know.

      Something a user knows, and something the user does not possess.

      Something a user possesses, and something a user knows.
